sense.def:
Elastic
je gumijasta snov, ki se raztegne, če jo nategnemo, in se vrne v prvotno velikost, kadar jo spustimo.

seg.quote: It snapped back like a piece of elastic.

sense.def:
Kar je
elastic
, se zlahka raztegne.

seg.quote: ...a softer, more elastic and lighter material.
The skin eventually loses its elasticity.

sense.def:
Zamisel ali način, ki je
elastic
, se lahko spremeni, da se prilagodi novim okoliščinam.

seg.quote: Liberal policy was sufficiently elastic to accommodate both views.
